channel.title: The Entheogenic Evolution
channel.description: Welcome to the Entheogenic Evolution Podcast, hosted by author Martin W. Ball, Ph.D. This podcast is dedicated to the discussion of the nondual and unitary nature of being as revealed by conscious entheogenic energetic awakening. Featuring music and art by Martin and the occasional interview with leading figures in psychedelic research.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Expanding consciousness, one quantum leap at a time
channel.itunes:author: Martin W. Ball
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Entheogenic Evolution Podcast, hosted by author Martin W. Ball, Ph.D. This podcast is dedicated to the discussion of the nondual and unitary nature of being as revealed by conscious entheogenic energetic awakening. Featuring music and art by Martin and the occasional interview with leading figures in psychedelic research.

item.title: All is One: Understanding Entheogens and Nonduality
item.description: For this episode, I read a short selection from my new mini-ebook, "All is One: Understanding Entheogens and Nonduality," plus some announcements about Evolver Calgary May Spore, The Higherside Chats, and a fundraiser event in Ashland for June 23rd. And of course, a little new music.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: For this episode, I read a short selection from my new mini-ebook, "All is One: Understanding Entheogens and Nonduality," plus some announcements about Evolver Calgary May Spore, The Higherside Chats, and a fundraiser event in Ashland for June 23rd. And of course, a little new music.

item.title: The Herbal Linchpin: A 4/20 Episode
item.description: Why legalizing herb is the one issue with the greatest potential to transform society . . . plus some new music (which is available for free download at www.martinball.bandcamp.com)
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Why legalizing herb is the one issue with the greatest potential to transform society . . . plus some new music (which is available for free download at www.martinball.bandcamp.com)

item.title: So You Want to Be Enlightened . . .
item.description: I share two short writings: "So You Want to Be Enlightened: 18 Questions and Answers Regarding Enlightenment" and "Pithy Nondual Wisdom Nuggets", featuring music by JaM (www.jessalynnandmartin.com) and myself, and cover art by Jessalynn Jones

item.title: More DMT with Mitch Schultz
item.description: We check in with independent film maker, Mitch Schultz, and discuss "The Spirit Molecule," the DMTRMX project, his in-progress film series, DMT Down Under, Alex Jones, Machine Elves, National Geographic, fiction, and more . . .
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: We check in with independent film maker, Mitch Schultz, and discuss "The Spirit Molecule," the DMTRMX project, his in-progress film series, DMT Down Under, Alex Jones, Machine Elves, National Geographic, fiction, and more . . .

item.title: TryptaMind
item.description: A sampling of songs from my new 2012 album, "TryptaMind" - the perfect soundtrack for all your Dynamic Movement and Transformation dance parties! For more music and to download tracks, visit my new music page on Facebook: www.facebook.com/pages/Martin-Ball-Psychedelic-Music/215575185191681

item.itunes:summary: A sampling of songs from my new 2012 album, "TryptaMind" - the perfect soundtrack for all your Dynamic Movement and Transformation dance parties! For more music and to download tracks, visit my new music page on Facebook: www.facebook.com/pages/Martin-Ball-Psychedelic-Music/215575185191681

item.title: Digesting the Spirit Molecule
item.description: For the first episode of 2012, I give a nondual analysis of the accounts of DMT experiences as recounted by participants of Rick Strassman's study in Mitch Schultz's film, "The Spirit Molecule." DMT experiences are seen as existing on a spectrum from dual (distinctions between subject and object/self and not-self - ie, from the perspective of the ego) to recognition of the full nature of the self as nondual and without separation.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: For the first episode of 2012, I give a nondual analysis of the accounts of DMT experiences as recounted by participants of Rick Strassman's study in Mitch Schultz's film, "The Spirit Molecule." DMT experiences are seen as existing on a spectrum from dual (distinctions between subject and object/self and not-self - ie, from the perspective of the ego) to recognition of the full nature of the self as nondual and without separation.

item.title: MWB@BM2011
item.description: Here's my talk from Friday morning at Sacred Spaces Village for Burning Man 2011. The talk was entitled "Entheogens as the Ultimate Rite of Passage into Unitary Consciousness." Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Here's my talk from Friday morning at Sacred Spaces Village for Burning Man 2011. The talk was entitled "Entheogens as the Ultimate Rite of Passage into Unitary Consciousness." Enjoy!

item.title: MWB at MAPS Catalysts Conference
item.description: Here's my talk from the Dec 11th MAPS Catalysts Conference in LA - direct from my iPod to the podcast. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Here's my talk from the Dec 11th MAPS Catalysts Conference in LA - direct from my iPod to the podcast. Enjoy!

item.title: MWB at Science and NonDuality Conference, 2010
item.description: Here's my talk from the 2010 Science and Non-Duality Conference in San Rafael, California. The topic of my section was "Entheogens as a Portal" and here I share about my experiences with 5-MeO-DMT and its implications for understanding non-dual, or unitary, experience - my favorite topic!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Here's my talk from the 2010 Science and Non-Duality Conference in San Rafael, California. The topic of my section was "Entheogens as a Portal" and here I share about my experiences with 5-MeO-DMT and its implications for understanding non-dual, or unitary, experience - my favorite topic!

item.title: Rick Doblin, MAPS - Part 2
item.description: Here's the rest of my conversation with Rick Doblin from the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS). Be sure and check out the upcoming MAPS conference in LA this December: www.maps.org/catalysts

item.title: Mitch Schultz - DMT: The Spirit Molecule - The Movie
item.description: With my first new interview in over a year, we've got Mitch Schultz, producer and director of the new film, "DMT: The Spirit Molecule," a documentary about dimethyltryptamine and the research conducted by Rick Strassman. You can get more info on the film by visiting www.thespiritmolecule.com

You can get more info on the film by visiting www.thespiritmolecule.com

item.title: EntheoRadio Interview with MWB
item.description: Here's a re-posting of my interview from EntheoRadio with Trevhar Hughes. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Here's a re-posting of my interview from EntheoRadio with Trevhar Hughes. Enjoy!

item.title: The Process
item.description: An experiential demonstration of the process . . . After several months off, it's a pleasure to bring you this episode. I've been giving it much thought, and have concluded that I'm basically done "explaining" things on the podcast, for the time being. For now, I'd much rather demonstrate. For those looking for further explanation, I invite you to take a look at my new site, "The Entheological Paradigm: Humanity's Guide to Reality" at www.entheological-paradigm.net And for those looking for music, I'm happy to let you know that my latest album, "The Medicine Show," is now available at iTunes. Enjoy! - Martin www.martinball.net
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary:
An experiential demonstration of the process . . .
After several months off, it's a pleasure to bring you this episode. I've been giving it much thought, and have concluded that I'm basically done "explaining" things on the podcast, for the time being. For now, I'd much rather demonstrate. For those looking for further explanation, I invite you to take a look at my new site, "The Entheological Paradigm: Humanity's Guide to Reality" at www.entheological-paradigm.net
And for those looking for music, I'm happy to let you know that my latest album, "The Medicine Show," is now available at iTunes.
Enjoy!
- Martin www.martinball.net

item.title: The Entheological Paradigm in Action
item.description: This week I address the subject of how the Entheological Paradigm, as explained in my book, Being Human, could be applied to society at large, especially in the area of education. Topic to most likely be continued in future podcasts . . . Also, our cover art this week is by Maureen "Mo" Murphy. You can find more of Mo's artwork at www.lucidkin.blogspot.com
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week I address the subject of how the Entheological Paradigm, as explained in my book, Being Human, could be applied to society at large, especially in the area of education. Topic to most likely be continued in future podcasts . . . Also, our cover art this week is by Maureen "Mo" Murphy. You can find more of Mo's artwork at www.lucidkin.blogspot.com

item.title: Liberation through Unknowing
item.description: This week I discuss the idea of transcending personal identity as constructed by culture, religion, politics, etc. through entheogenic awakening and why such an experience is merely the beginning of coming to know yourself and therefore a liberation through unknowing. More art by Sandeep Chandran from www.visionarytemple.com for the cover art this week as well.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week I discuss the idea of transcending personal identity as constructed by culture, religion, politics, etc. through entheogenic awakening and why such an experience is merely the beginning of coming to know yourself and therefore a liberation through unknowing. More art by Sandeep Chandran from www.visionarytemple.com for the cover art this week as well.

item.title: Opening to Energy with Entheogens, Part 2
item.description: We get deeper into the topic of how to explore energy with entheogens and why this kind of work can only be done with entheogens. Also features a re-podcasting of the limited edition "psychedelic artifact" as an example of expressing energy vocally as part of the process of getting to know one's energy. This week's cover art is by Sandeep Chandran of www.visionarytemple.com, where he has more psychedelic art for viewing and purchase.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: We get deeper into the topic of how to explore energy with entheogens and why this kind of work can only be done with entheogens. Also features a re-podcasting of the limited edition "psychedelic artifact" as an example of expressing energy vocally as part of the process of getting to know one's energy. This week's cover art is by Sandeep Chandran of www.visionarytemple.com, where he has more psychedelic art for viewing and purchase.

item.title: Opening to Energy with Entheogens, Part 1
item.description: This week I distinguish the methods of working with entheogens to explore energy from the practices of meditation and the dualism of shamanism and entheogenic religion as discussed in my new book, Being Human: An Entheological Guide to God, Evolution and the Fractal Energetic Nature of Reality
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball

item.title: Introducing Being Human
item.description: Happy to be back after a month off and introduce my new book, Being Human, An Entheological Guide to God, Evolution, and the Fractal Energetic Nature of Reality - a book that can change your life and change the world!

item.title: Jonathan Goldman and Santo Daime, Part 3
item.description: We wrap up our epic talk with Jonathan Goldman this week. We discuss the actual court case, the ruling, and what that means for the legal status of DMT containing sacraments in the U.S. ** Minor correction: It's www.denizentv.com, not .net!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary:
We wrap up our epic talk with Jonathan Goldman this week. We discuss the actual court case, the ruling, and what that means for the legal status of DMT containing sacraments in the U.S.
** Minor correction: It's www.denizentv.com, not .net!

item.title: Jonathan Goldman and Santo Daime, Part 2
item.description: We continue our talk with Jonathan Goldman from the Church of the Holy Light of the Queen. This week, we discuss how Santo Daime came to the U.S. and how the recent court case got started. Next week, the big conclusion with a win for Religious Freedom!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: We continue our talk with Jonathan Goldman from the Church of the Holy Light of the Queen. This week, we discuss how Santo Daime came to the U.S. and how the recent court case got started. Next week, the big conclusion with a win for Religious Freedom!

item.title: Jonathan Goldman, Santo Daime, and Religious Freedom
item.description: An historic interview with Jonathan Goldman, Padrinho of the Church of the Holy Light of the Queen in Ashland, Oregon. Jonathan led the court case against the federal government to recognize his church members' right to drink Daime, which contains DMT. Part 1 of a 3 part series. This week, Jonathan explains the origins of Santo Daime and his involvement with the Brazilian religion.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: An historic interview with Jonathan Goldman, Padrinho of the Church of the Holy Light of the Queen in Ashland, Oregon. Jonathan led the court case against the federal government to recognize his church members' right to drink Daime, which contains DMT. Part 1 of a 3 part series. This week, Jonathan explains the origins of Santo Daime and his involvement with the Brazilian religion.

item.title: 5-MeO-DMT, the God Molecule with James Oroc, Part 1
item.description: This week I talk with James Oroc, author of the new book, Tryptamine Palace, all about my favorite medicine, 5-MeO-DMT. The conversation goes into all kinds of realms including the Akashic field and zero-point energy. Fun!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week I talk with James Oroc, author of the new book, Tryptamine Palace, all about my favorite medicine, 5-MeO-DMT. The conversation goes into all kinds of realms including the Akashic field and zero-point energy. Fun!

item.title: Entheology and the Open Current
item.description: Finally! I reach the end of my ongoing monologue with a wrap up of the main ideas and suggestions for how to cultivate human freedom and responsibility from an entheological perspective.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Finally! I reach the end of my ongoing monologue with a wrap up of the main ideas and suggestions for how to cultivate human freedom and responsibility from an entheological perspective.

item.title: Living in Reality, Part 3
item.description: This week I take on the sacred cow of 2012 and rough it up a little
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week I take on the sacred cow of 2012 and rough it up a little

item.title: Living in Reality, Part 2
item.description: I continue with the same critical evaluations of systems of thought as last week, with the primary topics this week being Gnostic Christianity and Tibetan Dzogchen. I critique Gnostic dualism and disdain for material reality and critique Dzogchen as not recognizing the ontological status of mathematics and math-derived scientific knowledge.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: I continue with the same critical evaluations of systems of thought as last week, with the primary topics this week being Gnostic Christianity and Tibetan Dzogchen. I critique Gnostic dualism and disdain for material reality and critique Dzogchen as not recognizing the ontological status of mathematics and math-derived scientific knowledge.

item.title: Living in Reality and Human Responsibility
item.description: If our task is to be ourselves, then our responsibility is to live in reality, for we cannot be ourselves if we cannot distinguish between reality and fantasy. To that end, I begin a multi-part discussion of human systems of belief and thought, analyzing from the perspective I've been articulating over the past month. We begin with scientific materialism, the Anthropic Principle, and Christian faith.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: If our task is to be ourselves, then our responsibility is to live in reality, for we cannot be ourselves if we cannot distinguish between reality and fantasy. To that end, I begin a multi-part discussion of human systems of belief and thought, analyzing from the perspective I've been articulating over the past month. We begin with scientific materialism, the Anthropic Principle, and Christian faith.

item.title: Cosmogenesis and the Liquid Crystal Evolution, Part 2
item.description: I pick up right where I left off last week and bring us up to the present, along with a possible answer to the question of "Why?"
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: I pick up right where I left off last week and bring us up to the present, along with a possible answer to the question of "Why?"

item.title: Cosmogenesis and the Liquid Crystal Evolution
item.description: This week I begin to articulate my theory of everything, starting with a basic discussion of some of the fundamental principles of philosophy of science, metaphysics and ontology. To be continued next week and possibly beyond . . .

item.title: A Conversation with Bill Richards from Johns Hopkins, Part 2
item.description: We continue our talk with Bill Richards and I officially announce my trip to Peru with Richard Grossman for this summer. We're looking for adventurous individuals who would like to join us for a two-week exploration into Ayahuasca and the sacred medicines of Peru. Stop by at www.martinball.net for details and an application.

Stop by at www.martinball.net for details and an application.

item.title: A Conversation with Bill Richards from Johns Hopkins, Part 1
item.description: This week I interview Bill Richards, one of the lead researchers at Johns Hopkins University in their studies on psilocybin and mystical experience. I also remind everyone to get their tickets to the 5th annual Amazonian Shamanism Conference in Iquitos Peru and mention my name and podcast to help get me down there! www.soga-del-alma.org

item.description: We continue our conversation with Thomas B. Roberts with further updates on the Santo Daime trial in Oregon. Also I discuss the 5th Annual Amazonian Shamanism Conference www.soga-del-alma.org - mention my name and the podcast when you buy your ticket and a small portion will go to help to pay my airfare to get me down to Peru to speak at the conference =)

item.title: The Entheogenic Reformation with Thomas B. Roberts, Ph.D.
item.description: Our guest this week is Thomas B. Roberts, discussing his ideas of the Entheogenic Reformation, the Single State Fallacy, and Academic, Artistic and Religious Freedom regarding entheogen use. Also, we continue with the Gaianbotanicals.com raffle and I share a couple passages from Albert Hofmann's and Ann and Alexander Shulgin's essays in the book, Entheogens and the Future of Religion, by Robert Forte.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Our guest this week is Thomas B. Roberts, discussing his ideas of the Entheogenic Reformation, the Single State Fallacy, and Academic, Artistic and Religious Freedom regarding entheogen use. Also, we continue with the Gaianbotanicals.com raffle and I share a couple passages from Albert Hofmann's and Ann and Alexander Shulgin's essays in the book, Entheogens and the Future of Religion, by Robert Forte.

item.title: Sound Healing with Dr. Richard Grossman, Part 1
item.description: We start off the new year with a talk with Dr. Richard Grossman about his work with ayahuasca and sound healing. Part 1 of a 2 part talk. You can visit his website at www.soundjourney.com. Also, this episode features Dr. Grossman's music (didjeridu, gongs, jaw harps).

item.title: Roland Griffiths, Part 2, and the Great Entheogenic Evolution Sweepstakes!
item.description: We continue our conversation with Roland Griffiths from Johns Hopkins Medical School discussing psilocybin and mystical experience. Also, Hal helps out with announcing the winner of the Entheogenic Evolution Sweepstakes and we discuss how to integrate mystical/entheogenic experiences after the journey.

item.title: Mushrooms, Mysticism and Medicine - Roland Griffiths, Part 1
item.description: Part 1 of a conversation with Roland Griffiths from Johns Hopkins Medical School discussing their research programs with psilocybin on mysticism and cancer anxiety treatment. To volunteer as a research subject, visit www.cancer-insight.org Also, we continue the great Entheogenic Evolution sweepstakes!
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary:
Part 1 of a conversation with Roland Griffiths from Johns Hopkins Medical School discussing their research programs with psilocybin on mysticism and cancer anxiety treatment. To volunteer as a research subject, visit www.cancer-insight.org
Also, we continue the great Entheogenic Evolution sweepstakes!

item.title: Salvia Divinorum from A-Z with Daniel Siebert, Part 1
item.description: Daniel Siebert shares everything you've ever wanted to know about Salvia divinorum. In part 1, Daniel talks about the Mazatec Indians and their use of salvia and psilocybin mushrooms. Also, this week I'm happy to say that early release copies of my new book, The Entheogenic Evolution: Psychedelics, Consciousness and Awakening the Human Spirit is now available in paperback and PDF. You can order a copy at www.martinball.net or www.lulu.com/kyandara
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary:
Daniel Siebert shares everything you've ever wanted to know about Salvia divinorum. In part 1, Daniel talks about the Mazatec Indians and their use of salvia and psilocybin mushrooms.
Also, this week I'm happy to say that early release copies of my new book, The Entheogenic Evolution: Psychedelics, Consciousness and Awakening the Human Spirit is now available in paperback and PDF. You can order a copy at www.martinball.net or www.lulu.com/kyandara

item.title: Mycelium Messiah - John Rush discusses his new book, Failed God
item.description: Dr. John Rush discusses the evidence of entheogen use in Judaism, Islam, and Christianity - and yes, he says Jesus is a mushroom - along with his new book, Failed God: Fractured Myth in a Fragile World.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Dr. John Rush discusses the evidence of entheogen use in Judaism, Islam, and Christianity - and yes, he says Jesus is a mushroom - along with his new book, Failed God: Fractured Myth in a Fragile World.

item.title: The Energetic Body of God - an Entheogenic Perspective
item.description: This week I read an essay from my forthcoming book, the Entheogenic Evolution, where I propose a metaphysics of energy that might explain everything from physical objects to consciousness and living beings. Curious?
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week I read an essay from my forthcoming book, the Entheogenic Evolution, where I propose a metaphysics of energy that might explain everything from physical objects to consciousness and living beings. Curious?

item.title: Was Jesus a Mushroom? Interview with Jan Irvin, part 2
item.description: We continue our conversation with Jan Irvin from GnosticMedia.com about early Christianity and psychedelic mushrooms
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: We continue our conversation with Jan Irvin from GnosticMedia.com about early Christianity and psychedelic mushrooms

item.title: Was Jesus a Mushroom? Interview with Jan Irvin, part 1
item.description: This is the first in a two-part discussion with Jan Irvin from GnosticMedia.com about John Allegro's research indicating that Jesus was not an actual person but rather a psychedelic mushroom. Jan is the co-author of the book Astrotheology and Shamanism, is the co-producer of The Pharmacratic Inquisition, and is the author of the forthcoming, The Holy Mushroom. All are available at www.gnosticmedia.com (an earlier version of this episode that had some sound level problems has now been corrected and replaced)
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This is the first in a two-part discussion with Jan Irvin from GnosticMedia.com about John Allegro's research indicating that Jesus was not an actual person but rather a psychedelic mushroom. Jan is the co-author of the book Astrotheology and Shamanism, is the co-producer of The Pharmacratic Inquisition, and is the author of the forthcoming, The Holy Mushroom. All are available at www.gnosticmedia.com (an earlier version of this episode that had some sound level problems has now been corrected and replaced)

item.title: The Temple of Awakening Divinity
item.description: This week we visit once again with Hal and learn about the Temple of Awakening Divinity, which uses 5-MeO-DMT as a ceremonial sacrament
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week we visit once again with Hal and learn about the Temple of Awakening Divinity, which uses 5-MeO-DMT as a ceremonial sacrament

item.title: Inner Paths to Outer Space, Part 2
item.description: Our conversation with Dr. Rick Strassman continues this week with topic ranging from the importance of psychedelic states in the Old Testament to Strassman's vision for the Cottonwood Research Foundation (www.cottonwoodresearch.org)
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Our conversation with Dr. Rick Strassman continues this week with topic ranging from the importance of psychedelic states in the Old Testament to Strassman's vision for the Cottonwood Research Foundation (www.cottonwoodresearch.org)

item.title: Inner Paths to Outer Space with Dr. Rick Strassman
item.description: Rick Strassman shares thoughts on DMT, UFO's, aliens, spiritual realities, psychedelic research and more with a reading of the transcript of the recent interview I did with Strassman in New Mexico. Part 1 of a two-part episode.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Rick Strassman shares thoughts on DMT, UFO's, aliens, spiritual realities, psychedelic research and more with a reading of the transcript of the recent interview I did with Strassman in New Mexico. Part 1 of a two-part episode.

item.title: The Shaman Behind the Drum
item.description: Part I of a 2 part episode with an amazing interview with Timothy White, editor of Shaman's Drum magazine.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: Part I of a 2 part episode with an amazing interview with Timothy White, editor of Shaman's Drum magazine.

item.title: Shamans, Mystics, and the Law, part 2
item.description: This week I continue the discussion from the previous episode, focusing more on the legal issues surrounding the use of entheogens as a spiritual or religious practice. I talk about the Constitution, the Supreme Court, the Religious Freedom Restoration Act, The Native American Church, and the recent decision regarding the UDV's religious use of hosca.
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: This week I continue the discussion from the previous episode, focusing more on the legal issues surrounding the use of entheogens as a spiritual or religious practice. I talk about the Constitution, the Supreme Court, the Religious Freedom Restoration Act, The Native American Church, and the recent decision regarding the UDV's religious use of hosca.

item.title: Shamans, Mystics and the Law
item.description: The first part of a 2 (or more?) part talk about shamans, mystics, and the law. What is direct spiritual experience? How is it different from religion? Is direct spiritual experience protected by the law, and if not, why?
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
item.itunes:summary: The first part of a 2 (or more?) part talk about shamans, mystics, and the law. What is direct spiritual experience? How is it different from religion? Is direct spiritual experience protected by the law, and if not, why?

item.title: Sage of the Shamans
item.description: It's all about Salvia divinorum this week, plus news about Rick Strassman's Cottonwood Research Foundation
item.dc:creator: Martin W. Ball
